## Description {#details}

Takes <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> S and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> L.

For each AddRec sub-expression, use its post increment expression in case its <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> is L. If it is not L then use AddRec itself. If <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> contains non-invariant unknown <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> rewrite cannot be done.

Definition at line 4909 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/scalarevolution-cpp">ScalarEvolution.cpp</a>.
